senses.sense_definition: A diamine chemical compound with the formula NH₂-CH₂-CH₂-NH₂, used primarily in organic synthesis and the manufacture of polymers.

examples.text: The researcher added <w>ethylenediamine</w> to the solution to act as a chelating agent during the experiment.
Workers must wear protective gear when handling <w>anhydrous ethylenediamine</w> due to its corrosive nature.
